Train the RW1972 model

Run the calmr GUI

Run models given a set of parameters

Model parsers
get_optimizer_opts()
An assortment of functions to help fit models
fit_model()
Fit model to data
gen_ss_weights()
Model support functions
get_exp_opts()
Get options for an experiment
get_model()
Return a model function
get_model_params()
Obtain model parameters
get_output()
Get output from CalmrExperiment
graph(<CalmrExperiment>)
Graph model associations
graph()
Graph model associations
make_model_args()
Make a tibble to fit a calmr model
supported_models() .get_model_parnames()
Miscellaneous information functions supported_models returns the models supported in the package. supported_plots returns the plots supported by argument model. supported_families returns the families supported by fit_model. supported_optimizers returns the optimizers supported by fit_model. suported_plots returns the plots supported by argument model.
plot_vs() plot_acts() plot_rs() plot_as()
Plotting functions for calmr models
parse_design()
Parse each string in a design data.frame
pati
Rat responses from Patittucci et al. 2016
plot(<CalmrExperiment>)
Plot CalmrExperiment
plot(<CalmrRSA>)
Plot RSA
plot(<CalmrRSATest>)
Plot RSA test
predict(<CalmrFit>)
Predict from CalmrFit
run_experiment()
Run experiment
run_model()
Run a model
summary(<CalmrExperiment>)
Summarise CalmrExperiment
trial_parser()
Parses a string stipulating trials
